subject: Baseball
Steroids
lead_paragraph: If Barry Bonds hasn’t broken the home run record by the end of next week, the Giants then travel to, yes, Atlanta where Hank Aaron lives. Another chance for the ultimate irony.
snippet: If Barry Bonds hasn’t broken the home run record by the end of next week, the Giants then travel to, yes, Atlanta where Hank Aaron lives. Another chance for the ultimate irony.
